aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access based on the tags in the request

aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the tags attached to a Lex resource

aws:TagKeys.description: Filters access based on the set of tag keys in the request

lex:associatedIntents.description: Enables you to control access based on the intents included in the request

lex:associatedSlotTypes.description: Enables you to control access based on the slot types included in the request

lex:channelType.description: Enables you to control access based on the channel type included in the request
